exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet together, arms at sides. Jump feet apart while raising arms overhead. Jump back to start position. Keep a steady rhythm.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.instructions: Jog in place, driving knees up to hip height with each step. Pump arms naturally. Keep core tight and land softly on the balls of your feet.

exercises.name: Butt Kicks
exercises.instructions: Jog in place, kicking heels up toward your glutes with each step. Keep your torso upright and core engaged. Pump your arms naturally.

exercises.name: Arm Circles
exercises.instructions: Stand with arms extended to sides at shoulder height. Make small circles, gradually increasing size for 15 seconds. Reverse direction for 15 seconds.

exercises.name: Leg Swings
exercises.instructions: Hold a wall for balance. Swing one leg forward and backward in a controlled pendulum motion. Do 10 swings then switch legs. Keep your standing leg slightly bent.

exercises.name: Torso Twists
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, arms at chest level with elbows bent. Rotate your torso left and right in a controlled motion. Keep hips facing forward.

exercises.name: March in Place
exercises.instructions: March in place with exaggerated arm swings. Lift knees to a comfortable height. This is a gentler alternative to high knees — focus on big, controlled movements.

exercises.name: Standing Toe Touches
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet together. Hinge at hips and reach toward your toes. Keep knees slightly bent. Let gravity pull you down gently. Breathe and relax into the stretch.

exercises.name: Standing Quad Stretch
exercises.instructions: Stand on one leg, grab your opposite ankle behind you. Pull heel toward your glute. Keep knees together and torso upright. Use a wall for balance if needed.

exercises.name: Seated Hamstring Stretch
exercises.instructions: Sit with one leg extended, other foot against inner thigh. Reach toward extended foot, hinging at hips. Keep your back straight and breathe into the stretch.

exercises.name: Shoulder Cross-Body Stretch
exercises.instructions: Extend one arm across your chest. Use the opposite hand to press the arm closer to your body at the elbow. Hold and breathe. Switch arms.

exercises.name: Cat-Cow
exercises.instructions: On all fours, alternate between arching your back up toward the ceiling (cat) and dropping your belly toward the floor (cow). Move slowly with your breath — inhale for cow, exhale for cat.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.instructions: Kneel on the floor, sit back on your heels. Extend arms forward on the floor, resting forehead down. Breathe deeply and relax your entire body into the stretch.

exercises.name: Neck Rolls
exercises.instructions: Slowly roll your head in a circle — ear to shoulder, chin to chest. Move gently and avoid forcing the stretch. Do 20 seconds clockwise, then counterclockwise.

exercises.name: Chest Opener Stretch
exercises.instructions: Clasp hands behind your back. Straighten your arms and lift hands away from your body while squeezing shoulder blades together. Open your chest and breathe deeply.

exercises.name: Hip Circles
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hands on hips. Make large circles with your hips — clockwise for 20 seconds, then counterclockwise. Keep upper body stable.

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Stretch
exercises.instructions: Raise one arm overhead and bend the elbow, reaching your hand down your back. Use the other hand to gently press the elbow. Hold and breathe. Switch arms.

exercises.name: Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Hands shoulder-width apart on the floor, body in a straight line. Lower your chest to the ground, then push back up. Beginners: do these from your knees. Keep core tight throughout.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squats
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower your hips back and down as if sitting in a chair. Keep chest up, knees tracking over toes. Drive through heels to stand back up.

exercises.name: Alternating Lunges
exercises.instructions: Step forward with one leg, lowering your back knee toward the floor. Front knee stays over your ankle. Push back to standing and switch legs. Keep torso upright throughout.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Forearms on the floor, body in a straight line from head to heels. Engage your core and avoid letting hips sag or pike up. Breathe steadily and hold.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.instructions: Start in push-up position. Drive knees toward your chest alternately in a running motion. Keep hips level and core tight. Go at your own pace — speed isn't required.

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.instructions: Lean your back flat against a wall. Slide down until your thighs are parallel to the floor, knees at 90 degrees. Hold the position. Keep breathing — don't hold your breath.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.instructions: Lie on your back, knees bent, feet flat on the floor. Lift your hips toward the ceiling, squeezing your glutes at the top. Hold briefly, then lower slowly.

exercises.name: Modified Burpees
exercises.instructions: Squat down and place hands on the floor. Step feet back to a plank position (no push-up). Step feet back forward to squat. Stand up. Skip the jump for this beginner version.

exercises.name: Step-Ups
exercises.instructions: Use a sturdy step, bench, or bottom stair. Step up with one foot, drive through the heel to stand tall. Step back down with control. Alternate legs or do all reps on one side.

exercises.name: Superman Hold
exercises.instructions: Lie face down with arms extended forward. Simultaneously lift your arms, chest, and legs off the floor. Hold and squeeze your back muscles. Lower slowly.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.instructions: Lie on your back, knees bent, hands behind head or across chest. Curl your shoulders off the floor by engaging your abs. Lower slowly. Don't pull on your neck.

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.instructions: Lie on your back, hands behind head. Bring right elbow toward left knee while extending your right leg. Alternate sides in a pedaling motion. Move slowly and controlled.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.instructions: Lie on your back, legs straight. Slowly lift legs to 90 degrees, then lower them back down without touching the floor. Keep your lower back pressed into the ground.

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.instructions: Lie on your back, arms straight up, knees bent at 90 degrees. Extend your right arm back and left leg forward toward the floor. Return and switch sides. Keep lower back flat.

exercises.name: Bird Dog
exercises.instructions: On all fours, extend your right arm forward and left leg back simultaneously. Hold for a beat, squeezing your core. Return and switch sides. Keep hips level.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.instructions: Sit with knees bent, feet slightly off the floor (or on floor for easier version). Lean back slightly, clasp hands together. Rotate torso side to side, tapping hands near each hip.

exercises.name: Seated Forward Fold
exercises.instructions: Sit with both legs extended straight. Hinge at hips and reach toward your toes. Relax your head and neck. Breathe deeply and let gravity deepen the stretch over time.

exercises.name: Pigeon Stretch
exercises.instructions: From all fours, slide right knee forward behind your right wrist. Extend left leg straight back. Lower your torso over your front leg. Hold and breathe. Switch sides.

exercises.name: Figure-Four Stretch
exercises.instructions: Lie on your back. Cross right ankle over left knee making a figure-4 shape. Pull left thigh toward your chest until you feel a stretch in your right glute. Switch sides.

exercises.name: Lying Spinal Twist
exercises.instructions: Lie on your back. Pull one knee to your chest, then guide it across your body to the opposite side. Keep both shoulders on the floor. Look away from the knee. Breathe deeply.

exercises.name: Standing Calf Stretch
exercises.instructions: Face a wall with hands against it. Step one foot back, keeping heel on the floor and leg straight. Lean into the wall until you feel a stretch in your calf. Switch legs.

exercises.name: Side Lunges
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet wide apart. Shift your weight to one side, bending that knee while keeping the other leg straight. Push back to center and switch sides. Keep chest up.

exercises.name: Inchworm
exercises.instructions: Stand tall, hinge at hips and place hands on the floor. Walk hands forward to a plank position. Hold briefly, then walk hands back to your feet and stand up. Repeat.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Rise up on your toes as high as you can, squeezing your calves at the top. Lower slowly back down. Use a wall for balance if needed.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.instructions: Lie on your side, prop up on your forearm with elbow under shoulder. Lift hips off the floor to form a straight line. Hold. Beginners: keep bottom knee on the floor for support.
